short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for viewing/editing localforage data stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you use localForage for your website, this extension makes it easy to view, edit, and add localForage items right from a new devtools panel. Even if your bundler does not attach localforage to the window object, this extension works just fine by using it's own copy.
